title: Indication/directional signage along driveway showing the way leading to the parking spaces reserved
clause_text: Indication/directional signage along driveway showing the way leading to the parking spaces reserved for Differently abled persons should be provided The specified facilities for the buildings for Differently abled persons shall be as follows: Corridor connecting the entrance/exit for the Differently abled persons.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Indication/directional signage along driveway showing the way leading to the parking spaces reserved for Differently abled persons should be provided
